sentence.Network_en: Hitler, now ashen - gray , futilely strained at his chains.
sentence.Network_cn: 希特勒这时面如死灰,无可奈何地死拽住身上的锁链不放.

sentence.Network_en: Spinning futilely at first, the drivers of the engine at last caught the rails.
sentence.Network_cn: 那机车的主动轮起先转了一阵也没有用处, 可到底咬住了路轨啦.

sentence.Network_en: The driver, a woman, was gunning the engine, trying futilely to break free.
sentence.Network_cn: 司机是个女人, 她正在加大油门, 徒劳的试图逃脱.

list.abs: 若病人已达「医疗无效」（medical futility），生命品质过差，无法忍受的地步。此时医师不愿拔管、或撤除人工呼吸器及其他医疗武 …
•无效医疗(medical futility) 拉丁文“futilis”，本为「易漏的」意思。意以充满破洞的容器打水，当然是徒劳无功 。
快活林是当Rhode Montijo在一张纸上画一只有点像Cuddles的黄兔子，并在底下写着一行字：“ 抵抗无用（resistance is futile）（Resistance Is Futile）”时构 …
3，无效循环（futile cycle）：也称为底物循环。一对酶催化的循环反应，该循环通过ATP的水解导致热能的释放。
这里面的最后一句“反抗无用”（Resistance is futile），成为博格人的标志之一，并经常于其他地方使用或被恶搞。这句话曾经被TV La…

means.word_mean: 1. in a futile and unproductive manner

auth_sentence.content: He was an ex-con and a dishonorably discharged soldier a stain that he tried, futilely, to expunge from his record.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was an ex-con and a dishonorably discharged soldier a stain that he tried, futilely, to expunge from his record.
